column1:
Jamie Pressly anticipa la sua nuova comedy #JenniferFalls #serieTV

“Sai, tutto quello che dovrebbe essere, è, e quello che dovrebbe succedere, succede” dice in anteprima Jaime Pressly sulla nuova comedy di cui è protagonista, “Jennifer Falls” in partenza questa sera oltreoceano su DirecTV.

La star di “My Name Is Earl” racconta la prima impressione con la sceneggiatura del pilot scritta dal creatore della serie Matthew Carlson (“Malcolm in the Middle”). “L’ho…

TV Eye: What to Watch for June 2-8, 2014

It’s OITNB week! But that’s not until Friday, so we have some other stuff to keep us occupied until then.

Guilty pleasure alert! While it’s no Dynasty, this show, which is returning for its second season tonight, satisfies the prime-time soap itch for many while also conveying a message of sisterhood and support.

In this new comedy, Jaime Pressly (“My Name is Earl”) plays a single mother who loses her job at a bank and then moves in with her mother (Jessica Walter). Another “Earl” alum, Ethan Suplee, co-stars. Series premiere, 10:30 p.m. Wednesday, June 4, on TV Land.
